channel.title: How to make Emote Teleports not work if the player is Teleblocked
channel.description: Title says it all, I would like to know how to make my Emote teleports not work if the player trying to use them is Teleblocked.

item.title: How to make Emote Teleports not work if the player is Teleblocked
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

umm something like this

if (teleblock == true) { sendmessage("You cannot telly when tellyblock has been casted on you! } else if (teleblock == false) { the emote and whatever here }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make Emote Teleports not work if the player is Teleblocked

item.title: How to make Emote Teleports not work if the player is Teleblocked
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

else if(spellID == 12445) // teleblock (lvl 85 spell) if(playerLevel[6] >= 89) { startAnimation(1819); castOnPlayer.Teleblock(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 89) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 90 to cast this spell."); }

public void Teleblock() { teleblock = true; sendMessage("A teleblock has been cast on you!"); stillgfx(345, absY, absX); }

public boolean teleblock = false;

search for LogoutDelay = 60;
below it add

[code]public void teleblock()
{
teleblock = true;

}[/code]

Read full topic
